title: Mercury in Scorpio
summary: A penetrating, investigative mindset. Conversations seek depth, motives, and hidden information. The opportunity is to use discernment and honesty without tipping into suspicion or intensity that others cannot hold.

meaning.headline: Thinking digs beneath the surface for truth and strategy.

frames.text: Mercury in Scorpio sharpens focus on underlying motives, patterns, and power dynamics.
It favors confidentiality and targeted conversations over casual chatter.
Research, analysis, and problem-solving benefit from persistence.
Emotional honesty can deepen trust when delivered with care.
Intensity means you will uncover every secret or control outcomes.

frictions: Reading between the lines until stories become distorted
Holding back information to maintain control
opportunities: Transforming a lingering issue through honest dialogue

do: Share only what you are willing to stand behind.
Use your insight to protect, not to corner.
avoid: Digging for information you do not need

reusable_lines.text: Look beneath the surface, but let facts lead the way.
Depth works best when trust and consent stay intact.

forbidden_claims: Guarantees of uncovering truth or deception
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can aid deep research and honest dialogue
Agency-forward language: you choose what to investigate and share
Contextual framing: intensity helps when anchored in consent

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
